Class.name: Custom.QUESTIONNAIREQDC
Class.ViewQuery: SELECT ID AS ROWID, Q2 AS IsThePatientsFamilyAwareOfDischarge, Q3 AS HaveAppropraiteReferralsBeenInitiated, Q4 AS HasDischargeMedicationBeenDocumented, Q5 AS HasDischargeMedicationBeenOrderedFromPharmacy, Q1 AS WhatIsTheExpectedDischargeDate, QUESDate AS DateUpdated, QUESTime AS TimeUpdated, QUESUserDR->SSUSR_RowId AS UserUpdated, QUESScore AS Score FROM questionnaire.QDC
